explanation: [0-0] On an indoor basketball court, a blonde woman in blue athletic shorts and a green tank top stands in front of a person in a green bodysuit. The person in the green bodysuit has a basketball for a head. The woman has her hands on the basketball, and there is a basketball hoop to the side. The woman smiles at the camera.

[0-2] The woman, still smiling, starts bouncing the ball down from the head of the person in the green bodysuit. The person in the green bodysuit bounces back and forth with the movement of the ball as the woman dribbles.
